casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Nicholas R. BOYD CHISHOLM, Petitioner No. 607 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 16, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 16 th day of May, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the matter is REMANDED to that court for further consideration in light of Commonwealth v. Romero, ___ Pa. ___, 183 A.3d 364 (2018).
